title: PLEASE RIOT YOU MUSN'T CHANGE MORDEKAISER'S TITLE
body:
Please, I beg you. I am not even a Mordekaiser main but I feel this might COMPLETELY stop me and possibly some others from even playing him in the future. 

Lord of Death is so generic, it's in every game already.

I know Master of Metal may not fit him 'well' to you guys, but to us Morde fans it is PERFECT.

{{item:3070}}

The Iron Revenant. That sounds cool to me it's ominous, revenant is a cool word for someone who has returned from the dead, it on implies strength, it makes him sound like the shadow isles undead warlord  (which is what ideally he's always Ben to me)

I'm gonna keep sharing this title around with morde fans, see if they like the ide/direction

> Compromise! Master of metal is un fitting and lord of death is lame, let's call him
> The Iron Revenant. 

Master of Metal? Unfitting? All his skills are named after Heavy Metal Songs (or a play on words, such as Mace of Spades rather than Ace of Spades). He's the lead guitar in the Heavy Metal band Pentakill as well, and the first champion to have a Pentakill skin, because Metal.

[Riot even hired some people to make Pentakill songs.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oUiOylPbfV0)
Which all have an image of Mordekaiser's Helm.

Master of Metal is a duel entendre in Morde's case, and nothing is more fitting for the champion.
How about High Lord Master of Death Metal?

I heard a (in my opinon) better suggestion. "The Dead Iron King". He doesn't even have to be a king, but it sound like a name from a folk tale or something. Nobody really knows much about him, but he sounds fucking terrifying
I agree, the solution seems something that lies between the two titles.

The most common name I've seen touted around the forums is "Paladin of Pain"

To keep it in tune with the name...

The Iron Paladin
The Phantom Paladin
Fullmetal Harbinger

Yanno, stuff like that
I see my Fullmetal Harbinger is catching on ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Yeah I saw that in another thread haha
Yeah I saw that in another thread haha

Paladin at least implies someone who wears a hulking suit of armor and uses magic, so Paladin of Pain would probably be best (especially since that's what he's referred to as in his current lore and his other previous lores).
I feel like people are just joining the band-wagon now because it's cool or something.
Truth.

Master of Metal totally matches Mordekaiser. Lord of Death? WTF. That title belongs to Aatrox or something. I see why Riot would want to make him that, but he doesn't look like the Lord of Death, he looks like the Master of Metal. 
Lord of Death = Lord of Lame
Master of Metal = Mordekaiser
{{champion:82}}
LEAVE IT AS MASTER OF METAL PLS <3
"The Lord of Death" . . . Is riot ran by 10 year olds?
Something about the suit of armor needs to remain in his lore and make up his identity... It's such an easy tie-in, and I see no reason to run away from it. It's a poor choice, no doubt.
